# Rubric Templates

## Analytic Rubric (4 Levels)
| Criterion | Excellent (4) | Good (3) | Fair (2) | Poor (1) |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| Accuracy |  |  |  |  |
| Completeness |  |  |  |  |
| Clarity |  |  |  |  |
| Design/Style |  |  |  |  |
| Professionalism |  |  |  |  |

## Code Task Rubric
- **Correctness** (tests pass) — 40%
- **Readability** (naming, structure) — 20%
- **Robustness** (errors/edge cases) — 20%
- **Documentation** (comments/README) — 10%
- **Presentation/Demo** — 10%

> Customize criteria and weights per course.
